products.name: 3 Hand Sanitizers Mystic Foliage
products.about: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. This Mystic Foliage collection will leave your hands delicately scented and remind you of the warmness of the tropics and the exotic flora.
products.howToUse:
1.Spray until your hands are sufficiently covered 
 2.Shuffle fingertips in palm.
 3.Rub your hands inside and out.
 4.Rub between your fingers.
 5.Enjoy clean and soft hands.
products.ingredients:
Hand Sanitizer Forest Grace: Green energy and the effervescence of fruit.
  Hand Sanitizer Wild Orchid: Wild orchids around the warmth of vanilla flower and Indian Sandalwood.
  Hand Sanitizer Tales of Lotus:Delicate water petals are covered with white figs and dry fruit notes.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer - Blossom Elixir 3 Pack
products.about: The best scents inspired by the healing powers of floral and plant-derived extracts combined in one cute HAAN Pocket package: Bright Rose, Purifying Verbena and Healing Chrysants. The ideal mix of aromas to make you feel relaxed!
products.howToUse:
1.Spray until your hands are sufficiently covered
 2.Shuffle fingertips in palm.
 3.Rub your hands inside and out.
 4.Rub between your fingers.
 5.Enjoy clean and soft hands.
products.ingredients:
Ethyl Alcohol Denat:Natural ingredient that kills 99.99% of bacteria and viruses, protecting the skin from all kinds of microorganisms that cause infesctions.
 Aloe Vera:Plant-based ingredient known for its moisturizing, antioxidant and antibacterial benefits. Aloe soothes and softens the skin, improving its healthy look without leaving a sticky feeling.
 Aqua: You already know water but... did you know it is present in most personal care products? Water hydrates and improves the effect of other active ingredients in any formula.
 Glucose Derivative:Highly hydrating natural that works as a humectant helping the skin to cling onto water. A plus? it has a smooth, silky feel to make its applying experience more luxurious!

products.name: Niacinamide Face Cleanser â€“ for Oily Skin
products.about: Composed of 97% ingredients of natural origin, this gel will cleanse your skin while balancing it and preparing it for the next steps.The main active ingredient you will find inside is Niacinamide; a form of vitamin B3 that reduces oil production in the skin and also the visibility of the pore size.
products.howToUse: Apply morning and evening, massaging onto wet skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with water.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Niacinamide, Parfum (Fragrance), Disodium EDTA, Inulin, Tretasodium EDTA, Fructose

products.name: Peptide Face Cleanser Refill Regular price
products.about: Composed of 97,1% ingredients of natural origin, this gel will cleanse your skin while hydrating and bringing elasticity to it. Peptide is an active antioxidant that helps counteract the effects of pollution, provides luminosity and improves the signs of aging.
products.howToUse: Apply morning and evening, massaging onto wet skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with water.
products.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Parfum(Fragrance), Inulin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Fructose, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2.

products.name: Full Skin Care Routine - for Oily Skin
products.about: Reduces oil production in the skin. Controls dark spots and hyper-pigmentation. Calms redness and evens skin texture. Improves the skin barrier
products.howToUse:
Face Cleanser:Apply morning and evening, massaging onto wet skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with water.
 Face Cream:Apply and massage morning and/or night on cleansed skin.
 Face Serum: Apply morning and evening after cleansing and drying the skin, massaging gently until completely absorbed.
products.ingredients:
Niacinamide Face Cleanser: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Niacinamide, Parfum (Fragrance), Disodium EDTA, Inulin, Tretasodium EDTA, Fructose.
 Niacinamide Face Cream: Aqua, Niacidamide, Caprylyl caprylate/caprate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Inulin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium, Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Parfum(Fragrance), Fructose, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Linalool, Tocopherol, Citronellol, Geraniol.

products.name: Full Skin Care Routine - for Dry Skin
products.about: Reduces oil production in the skin. Controls dark spots and hyper-pigmentation. Calms redness and evens skin texture. Improves the skin barrier
products.howToUse:
Face Cleanser:Apply morning and evening, massaging onto wet skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with water.
 Face Cream:Apply and massage morning and/or night on cleansed skin.
 Face Serum: Apply morning and evening after cleansing and drying the skin, massaging gently until completely absorbed.
products.ingredients:
Niacinamide Face Cleanser: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Niacinamide, Parfum (Fragrance), Disodium EDTA, Inulin, Tretasodium EDTA, Fructose.
 Niacinamide Face Cream: Aqua, Niacidamide, Caprylyl caprylate/caprate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Inulin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium, Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Parfum(Fragrance), Fructose, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Linalool, Tocopherol, Citronellol, Geraniol.

products.name: Rich Hand Cream Pack
products.about: An incredibly moisturising hand cream collection inspired by creamy popsicles packed with all that prebiotic superfood your skin needs to stay healthy from the inside out! Made with 96% natural origin ingredients, these three exclusive fragrances are here to nourish your skin, leaving a silky hydrating finish.
products.howToUse: 1.Apply a small amount onto the skin and massage gently until absorved.
products.ingredients: Carrot Kick: 1,2- Hexanediol, Aqua, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, C13-15 Alkane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol , Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Cetyl Alcohol, Clyceryl Stearate, Coumarin, Disodium Cetearyl Sulfosuccinate, Fructose, Glycol Palmitate, Helianthis Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Hexyl Cinnamal, Inulin , Jojoba Esters , Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Lecithin, Limonene, Linalool, Parfum , Phenylpropanol, Phytic Acid, Polyglycerin-3, Pullulan, Scelerotium Gum, Silica, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum.

products.name: Fluoride Free Toothpaste Pack
products.about: A toothpaste collection that remineralizes your teeth thanks to a premium formula with hydroxyapatite and prebiotics. Made with clean, vegan ingredients, our naturally whitening toothpaste will keep your smile whiter and healthier. Experience the fresh flavors inspired by dreamy locations around the world.
products.howToUse: Brush thoroughly after each meal, or as directed by a dentist. Do not swallow. Suitable for children over the age of 3 years.
products.ingredients: Apple Day: Aqua, Cetylpyridinium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fructose, Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Hydroxypatite, Inulin, Mentha Arvensis Herb Oil , Mentha Piperita Oil, Parfum, Peg-8, Potassium Benzoate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Saccharin, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Xanthan Gum, Xylitol.

products.name: Toothpaste Life's a Beach
products.about: A spicy mix of chai tea & mint, this refreshing flavor is here to remineralize your teeth thanks to its clean formula with Hydroxyapatite. Say hello to a healthy and bright smile!
products.howToUse: Brush thoroughly after each meal, or as directed by a dentist. Do not swallow. Suitable for children over the age of 3 years.
